title: Thunderbolt
description:
Called "An episode in the history of a provincial family", where "their faults of manner and breeding are precisely the faults a reasonable, dispassionate person would have no difficulty in excusing." Edward, the wealthy black sheep of the family, has died. But how to divide the money when no will is found? - Summary by ToddHW
